name: Campaign
description: The Campaign class describes a campaign of attacks by a threat actor.

URL.name: URL
URL.description: A URL to a reference describing the campaign.

AdditionalData.name: AdditionalData
AdditionalData.description: A mechanism by which to extend the data model.

ext-restriction.name: ext-restriction
ext-restriction.description: A means by which to extend the restriction attribute.  See Section 5.1.1.
